definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Key removable in locked position only. Spring loaded clip-in pawl.
sentences.chinese: 只能從門外用鑰匙開的彈簧門鎖。

sentences.english: The swing door will resile automatically after it has been opened.
sentences.chinese: 彈簧門被打開後可以自動彈回。
